title: $150 BetMGM Bonus Code  CUSE150  upgraded for UFC 322 !
body_text:
As UFC 322 takes over Madison Square Garden in New York City, BetMGM has updated its CUSE150 bonus code, giving new users a chance to earn $150 in bonus bets if their first wager wins.
The deal is straightforward: Bet $10, Get $150 in bonus bets if you win. And when you sign up today with BetMGM bonus code CUSE150, you’ll also unlock BetMGM’s popular fight night parlay boosts, early payout options, and same-game parlay features.
BetMGM Bonus Code CUSE150 Details for Saturday, November 15, 2025:
- Bonus Offer: Bet $10, Get $150 in Bonus Bets if You Win
- Eligible States: MI, NJ, PA, WV
- How to Qualify:
- Sign Up: Register a new account using BetMGM bonus code CUSE150
- Deposit: Add at least $10 to your account
- Bet: Wager $10 on any UFC 322 fight
- Receive: $150 in bonus bets if your first wager wins
Bonus bets are credited within 24 hours of your qualifying wager settling and can be used across UFC, NFL, NBA, and more.
How to Use BetMGM Bonus Code CUSE150 for UFC 322:
- Step 1: Sign up at BetMGM using the CUSE150 bonus code
- Step 2: Deposit a minimum of $10
- Step 3: Bet $10 on any UFC 322 fight or another eligible market
- Step 4: Win your bet and receive $150 in bonus bets
Pennsylvania Option: BetMGM Casino Promo
If you’re in Pennsylvania, BetMGM Casino offers a dual bonus: 100% Deposit Match up to $1,000, plus $25 on the house.
Event Preview: UFC 322 – Saturday, November 15, 2025
- Date: Saturday, November 15, 2025
- Location: Madison Square Garden – New York City, NY
- Main Card Start Time: 10:00 PM ET / 7:00 PM PT
- Prelims Start Time: 7:00 PM ET / 4:00 PM PT
- Main Event: Jack Della Maddalena (C) vs. Islam Makhachev — Welterweight Title Bout
- Co-Main Event: Valentina Shevchenko (C) vs. Zhang Weili — Women’s Flyweight Title Bout
- How to Watch: ESPN+ Pay-Per-View (Main Card) / ESPN+ & ESPN2 (Prelims)
UFC 322 Main Card:
Here’s the latest confirmed lineup for UFC 322 on Saturday at Madison Square Garden.
Main Card
- Jack Della Maddalena (c) vs. Islam Makhachev — Welterweight Championship
- Valentina Shevchenko (c) vs. Zhang Weili — Women’s Flyweight Championship
- Sean Brady vs. Michael Morales — Welterweight contender bout
- Leon Edwards vs. Carlos Prates — Welterweight division fight
- Beneil Dariush vs. Benoit Saint-Denis — Lightweight matchup
Prelims
The preliminary slate features a strong mix of rising prospects and veterans:
- Bo Nickal vs. Rodolfo Vieira — Middleweight bout
- Roman Kopylov vs. Gregory Rodrigues — Middleweight fight
- Erin Blanchfield vs. Tracy Cortez — Women’s Flyweight bout
- Kyle Daukaus vs. Gerald Meerschaert — Middleweight bout
- Pat Sabatini vs. Chepe Mariscal — Featherweight or lightweight, depending on final assignment
New: Upgraded BetMGM Promos Now Included with CUSE150
When you sign up using BetMGM bonus code CUSE150, you’ll also receive access to these exclusive promos:
Nevada Sportsbook Offer
Nevada users who register in person can access up to $250 in bonus bets if your first in-person sportsbook wager loses.
$1,500 First Bet Offer
In states where the $150 offer doesn’t apply (like NY, VA, IL, and NC), BetMGM bonus code CUSE150 provides up to $1,500 in bonus bets if your first bet loses. This safety net gives you a second chance at a strong start, regardless of the result.
Odds Boost Tokens
BetMGM is rolling out day-by-day tokens to celebrate football season. These daily odds boosts give users extra value across NFL and CFB markets all week long.
Final Thoughts on the BetMGM Bonus Code CUSE150 for UFC 322:
With a high-stakes main event between Jack Della Maddalena and Islam Makhachev headlining UFC 322, BetMGM’s CUSE150 bonus code gives new users the perfect chance to get in on the action.
Place your first $10 bet and get $150 in bonus bets if your wager wins, plus enjoy BetMGM’s lineup of fight night parlay boosts and early payout options.
Sign up now with BetMGM bonus code CUSE150 and enjoy every moment of UFC 322 with a chance to score $150 in bonus bets..
